00080 class ObexServerAddr : public ObexAddress {
00081 
00082     public:
00083         typedef ObexAddress Base;
00084 
00086         virtual ObexAddrTypeId  GetTypeId() const;
00087 
00088         /*  @brief  Tells whether address was auto - registered by transport.
00089 
00090             The default implementation returns always \c 'TRUE'.
00091 
00092             @return \c 'TRUE' when the transport that created this address has
00093                     registered it with a service discovery database or if no
00094                     such facility exists, \c 'FALSE' if application software
00095                     needs to perform service registration. */
00096         virtual BOOLEAN         IsAutoRegistered() const;
00097 
00098     protected:
00100         ObexServerAddr(ObexTransportId  transport_id);
00101 };
